name: marecoin-dcoa
description: A Digital Certificate of Authenticity token for the Silver Mare Coin being minted by /mlp/ in 2022

scripts.deploy-mumbai: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat deploy --export abi/SilverMareCoinDCoA-mumbai.json --reset --network mumbai
scripts.deploy-polygon: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat deploy --export abi/SilverMareCoinDCoA.json --network polygon
scripts.deploy-ropsten: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat deploy --export abi/SilverMareCoinDCoA-ropsten.json --reset --network ropsten
scripts.github: git commit -a && git push origin master

author: Twifag
